extendedInfo.description: Tiny Pop- A new super exciting bubble shooter! Save the Tiny Farm Animals! Oh no! The cute animals from Tiny Farm are trapped inside bubbles! Work with Ben, the Tiny Farm Sheep, to rescue as many animal friends as you can. Pop special power-up bubbles to save more animals at once!You can play Tiny Pop in English, German, French, íêµ­ì´, æ¥æ¬èª, ä¸­æç®ä½, or ä¸­æç¹é«.Tablets supported!Want to enjoy Tiny Pop on a big screen? No problem! Download Tiny Pop on your tablet now!FEATURESEasy and fun for everyone!- Tap the screen to shoot your bubbles in any direction! - If you hit matching color bubbles, they'll burst!Time Attack! Pop 'til you drop in 60 seconds!- Aim for the score multiplier bubbles to gain more points!- Use special power-ups like Lazers, Bombs, and Shot guides to get the highest score!- Pop at a furious speed to enter Fever mode! The Fever Rabbits will cheer you on!Survival Mode! How long can you survive?- A tick tock, super-fast timed game mode!- Running out of time? reviews.title: So cute!
reviews.comment: Adorable and fun! Easy to play for totally free.
reviews.author: Kathryn Brewer

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love this game. Perfect quick game for fun .
reviews.author: Julie Stanton

reviews.title: Fast, cute fun
reviews.comment: Simple and addictive gameplay that is made better by the polished presentation and fast paced modes.  COM2US always impresses me.
reviews.author: Daniel Leary

reviews.title: Pretty great
reviews.comment: It make u think fast it does charge. Its fun
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great time killer
reviews.comment: Fun though could use a  introduction level
reviews.author: Stephen Hilton

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: I would have rated higher but the game has things working against it. 1. The timer 2. The hearts get rid of one or the other.  They are counter productive. No time to enjoy the game will out spending a lot of money ; just to keep hearts full or use powerups. .
reviews.author: ric Miller

reviews.title: I enjoyed it
reviews.comment: A little easy but it\'s fast and fun. However it did crash on me a few times.
reviews.author: Jasmine Bacote

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I like this game a lot   Keep it up peeps
reviews.author: Takmina Hussain

reviews.comment: Tiny Pop is amazing! Always have some trouble getting it to load though. Would give 5 stars if lives regenerated quicker!
reviews.author: Rebecca Placke

reviews.title: As always!
reviews.comment: Great JOB!i am a big fan of ur apps! They\'re all so cute to play! Keeps you playing for ages :] keep up the awesome work ^^ Its a really cute game. Nice little com2us twist on the mundane game :]
reviews.author: Tani Saguinsin

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Nice and simple but very addictive.
reviews.author: Pablo Cervantes

reviews.title: Fun and cute!
reviews.comment: Very addicting, fun and super cute!
reviews.author: Renee Virgo

reviews.title: Fun but glitchy
reviews.comment: Cute, fun, if short lived gameplay in the sense there isn\'t a more casual mode that isn\'t a frantic time/score attack. Loses points for random black screens though. (Something wrong with ads maybe?)
reviews.author: Nelson Duarte

reviews.title: Glitches
reviews.comment: Love the game but it had some serious glitches would give 5 stars if the glitches we fixed : (
reviews.author: Jessica Pearson

reviews.title: Great fun but needs some work
reviews.comment: As any game that is developed for the focus of a Japanese market and then translated, there are some weird hiccups that I feel could be easily resolved if only some time were put into it.. For one.. Energy bar games have gotten out of control. Let us be lazy and play on our phones non-stop. That\'s not up to you to put in a feature that forces us to pay to touch our phones absentmindedly while on the train to work. If you want to nickel and done us there are better fields than phone apps.
reviews.author: Tamela Yates

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Great time killer
reviews.author: Joe Richmond

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Amazing
reviews.author: justin lamnea

reviews.title: Classic Game
reviews.comment: Revamp of an old-school game where you launch bubbles to make pairs before time runs out.
reviews.author: SparkieGT

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Fun game, but sometimes the screen randomly goes black and I have to reinstall. It ducks when I\'m in the middle of a game and that happens.
reviews.author: Vivian Tran

reviews.title: Sucks!!!!
reviews.comment: Not enough time on the timer! And no casual mode can\'t even get through the first of. Because of the timer. To bad i really luv the game otherwise
reviews.author: Lilmom Nc
